titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to permanently extend the deduction for the health insurance costs of self-employed individuals and to increase the deduction to 100 percent of such costs.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 6/23/1993--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to make permanent, and to increase to 100 percent, the deduction for the health insurance costs of self-employed individuals.
